tool_description: Analyzes interview responses to detect confidence levels, hesitation patterns, and self-assurance indicators in candidate communication.
error_messages: Array length mismatch: Responses and response_times must have equal length
Invalid response times: All times must be positive numbers
Empty responses: Provide at least one response to analyze
Insufficient response data: Responses too brief for confidence analysis
usage: Provide responses and response_times arrays with matching lengths. The tool analyzes linguistic patterns and timing to assess confidence levels.

hesitation_indicators.description: Hesitation detected flags for each response
